::Firearm/Rex/Prowl/Striker/Ramulus/Ramhorn/Smokescreen::

Firearm and Rex jump at Tankorr, firing at him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl looks around the battle. For now the Predacons didn't seem to be posing 
a challenge. He walks back into the ship, entering the bridge. "Computer, 
locate unit Dinobot."

The scanners show him Dinobot's position. Prowl's eyes widen.

The Maximal grabs the equipment he had gathered, running out of the ship and 
flying toward the Alliance base.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker continues to fly after Alpha, firing another shot at him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ramhorn arrives at the Ark, settling down to the boring duty of being a 
sentry.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Smokescreen runs toward Inferno, firing at him.
